instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1466 left shift keyboard issye
threads.message:
Hello guys.
 I got a Macbook Air a1466 come in last week that had issues with the left shift key.
i have replaced the keyboard with a brand new one which seem to have fixed the problem, however the next day I have booted the MacBook to have it boot in safe mode and it seems the shift key is continuously on yet it's a new keyboard and was working yesterday.
has anyone else had this issue ?

threads.title: A1466 left shift keyboard issye
threads.message: Trackpad has corrosion. Either clean or replace.
